cmp: 匕 (an ancient type of spoon, dagger/ladle)
mng: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity, old (of people), venerable (person), experienced, of long standing, always, all the time, of the past, very, outdated, (of meat etc) tough

exm.mng: old man or woman, the elderly, one's aged parents or grandparents
old age, aging, aged, geriatric, the aged
(coll.) eunuch, see also 老公[lao3 gong1]
